mainQuote.text: God is with you wherever you go

contactUsQuote.text: How good and pleasant it is when God’s people live together in unity!

prayerRequest.title: Do you have a prayer need?

quote.text: Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.

childrenVideo.title: Special wishes for our community from the children
childrenVideo.quote: We wish everyone good health and abundant blessings, and as a special wish we send you the inspiring psalm of David.
childrenVideo.quoteFooter: Department of Children's Ministry of the First Russian SDA Church

location.name: First Russian SDA church
location.area: is located in Gravesend area of Brooklyn, NY.

gatherOnline.title: Join us Saturday mornings as we gather online.
body: First Russian SDA Church wants to do everything we can to ensure that our communities are taking the necessary precautions to slow the spread of COVID-19. At the same time, we want to make it possible for everyone to experience the fellowship and Biblical teaching that keeps our faith strong, which is more important now than ever.
With this in mind, we are ready to offer a series of special live stream worship services, Saturdays at 10 am EST. These will take the place of in-person services. We hope you’ll join us online!
gatherOnline.reactOut: Reach out to get meeting details
gatherOnline.contact: Reach out to get meeting details
